newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Holderbank to at least match 96 results.
newsitem.headline: Holderbank to at least match 96 results.

text.p: Holderbank Financiere Glarus Ltd said it expected to least match 1996 results in 1997.

"The results achieved by the group companies in the first few months of the year indicate that -- thanks to the sustained economic upturn in North and Latin America, generally stable conditions in Western Europe, livelier demand in Central Europe and attractive market fundamentals in most other regions -- Holderbank can expect to at least match last year's results in 1997," chairman Thomas Schmidheiny said in a statement.
Holderbank reported a net profit of 196 million Swiss francs for 1996 after provisions and value adjustments of 450 million.
